trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the cardinality of an import is not compatible with the cardinality of the matching exports.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply".
This message takes into account the current system culture.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
Property
Value
`null`.
The localized error message string.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException>.
Property
Value
`null`.
The error message string specified in `message`.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException"></xref>, or `null` to set the <xref href="System.Exception.Message"></xref> property to its default value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException"></xref> class with serialized data.
This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/framework/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
An object that holds the serialized object data about the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException"></xref>.
An object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
info is `null`.
info is missing a required value.
info contains a value that cannot be cast to the correct type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportCardinalityMismatchException>.
Property
Value
`null`.
The error message string specified in `message`.
The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the innerException parameter is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a `catch` block that handles the inner exception.
